author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the high-level `IOTrace` message to RNTupleTempSource. It also extends to `edmStorageTrace.py` script with
* Better identification of overlapping reads (in the order the reads are done)
* Correlating the reads with the high-level `IOTrace` messages in a CMSSW log file
* An option to plot the reads (read offset+size vs time)

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1589

#### PR validation:

Tested in private tests
title: Add `IOTrace` printouts to `RNTupleTempSource`, and update trace processing script
